HTML5 - Id

  • Id is an attribute
  • They target a unique piece of content, allowing it to be referenced elsewhere
<p> <label for=“fName”>First name:</label> <input type=“text” id=“fName” name=“fName” /> </p>
  • The id « fName » allows the tag label to be « attached » to its input.
  • The attribution of ids and classes must be well considered and balanced. Not too much, not too few. As it must.
